content.text:
Let me analyze the task and provide a detailed solution:

1. Analysis of Main Target Image:
- Total Blocks: 10 blocks
- Colors: Red (most prevalent), Yellow, Green, Blue
- Layers: 3-4 layers tall
- Structure: Two interconnected tower-like formations with arched and circular openings
- Spatial Arrangement: Complex, with blocks interlocking and supporting each other

2. Block Selection from Dictionary:
Required blocks (by index):
- Red curved arch blocks (index 1-4): Multiple times
- Green rectangular blocks (index 9-10): 2 times
- Blue cube block (index 6): 1 time
- Yellow rectangular blocks (index 11-12): 2 times
- Orange triangular blocks (index 15-16): 1 time

3. Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 (red curved arch base)
    Step2: Move block with index 1 (red curved arch to connect)
    Step3: Move block with index 5 (red curved segment)
    Step4: Move block with index 9 (green rectangular block)
    Step5: Move block with index 6 (blue cube)
    Step6: Move block with index 10 (green rectangular block)
    Step7: Move block with index 11 (yellow rectangular block)
    Step8: Move block with index 12 (yellow rectangular block)
    Step9: Move block with index 15 (orange triangular block on top)
}
